title: Cinnamon Coffee and Meeting House
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Previously all veg but started serving meat as reported to HappyCow Dec 2010. Please confirm if this place should remain listed. Coffeehouse serving wholefood with focus on fair trade, organic, and local produce. Soups, carrot cake, banana breakfast smoothie, and more. Offers a library of books, newspapers, magazines, and boardgames, and arts events.
streetAddress: Waterloo House, Cartway, Bridgnorth, Shropshire, UK
